  2. SOUTH TEXAS WITH BREAKLIGHTS

  3. WE'RE RECORDING AT THE BLASTING ROOM

    We’re extremely excited to announce that we’re recording at the legendary The Blasting Room! We’ll be heading up to Fort Collins, CO, the first week in April to begin tracking our next record “Don’t Try So Hard”. Stephen Egerton will once again be mixing. STOKED. …

    4 Feb 2017 • on 2017 recording blasting room dont try so hard
